boolean.title: boolean input
boolean.description: Boolean inputs show a on/off toggle. In this example, the toggle has the label 'Opt in'

string.title: string input
string.description: String inputs show a text input

number.title: number input
number.description: Number inputs show a text input that is restricted to entering numbers

auto complete.title: autocomplete input
auto complete.description: Autocomplete inputs show a text input that autocompletes to the options specified in the jsonata expression

select.title: select input
select.description: Select inputs show a drop-down selection with the options specified in the jsonata expression

multi select.title: multi select input
multi select.description: Multi Select inputs show a drop-down selection with the options specified in the jsonata expression. Multiple options can be selected yielding an array of values

key value.title: key value input
key value.description: key value inputs display a two column table to enter keys and values. Returns a JSON object

textarea.title: textarea input
textarea.description: Shows a multi line input field (textarea)

date.title: date input
date.description: Shows a date picker input. Returns a YYYY-MM-DD string with the selected date

time.title: time input
time.description: Shows a time picker input. Returns a ISO 8601 date string with the current day and the selected time

file.title: file input
file.description: Allows uploading a file. returns the file contents

binary file.title: binary file input
binary file.description: Allows uploading a file. returns the file contents as a base 64 encoded data URL

file with metadata.title: file with metadata input
file with metadata.description: Allows uploading a file. returns an object with name, lastModified, size, type, and value (containing the file contents)

binary file with metadata.title: binary file with metadata input
binary file with metadata.description: Allows uploading a file. returns an object with name, lastModified, size, type, and value (containing the file contents as a base 64 encoded data URL)

voice.title: voice input
voice.description: Shows a text input field with a voice option

qrcode.title: qrcode input
qrcode.description: Allows scanning a QR Code into the form field
qrcode.output: whatever was encoded in the QR code
